name: Mighty Lion
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="lionBodyGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="maneGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,0);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,70,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="120" fill="url(#maneGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="80" fill="url(#lionBodyGrad)" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 256 320 L 350 350 L 320 256 Z" fill="url(#lionBodyGrad)" />
</svg>

name: African Elephant
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="elephantGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="100" fill="url(#elephantGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="320" r="40" fill="url(#elephantGrad)" />
  <path d="M 180 320 L 100 250 L 100 390 Z" fill="url(#elephantGrad)" />
  <path d="M 150 320 L 150 150 Q 200 100, 250 150 L 250 320 Z" fill="url(#elephantGrad)" />
  <path d="M 160 350 L 160 450 M 240 380 L 240 450 M 320 380 L 320 450" stroke="#808080" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Tall Giraffe
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="giraffeGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,220,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,170,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="380" rx="100" ry="60" fill="url(#giraffeGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 320 L 256 100" stroke="url(#giraffeGrad)" stroke-width="30" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="80" r="30" fill="url(#giraffeGrad)" />
  <circle cx="246" cy="70" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="266" cy="70" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="240" cy="120" r="15" fill="#8B4513" />
  <circle cx="272" cy="120" r="15" fill="#8B4513" />
</svg>

name: Striped Tiger
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="tigerGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,150,0);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,100,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 300 C 150 200, 400 200, 450 300 C 400 350, 150 350, 100 300 Z" fill="url(#tigerGrad)" />
  <path d="M 150 200 L 180 200 L 165 240 Z" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 250 200 L 280 200 L 265 240 Z" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 350 200 L 380 200 L 365 240 Z" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="300" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="430" cy="300" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Grey Rhinoceros
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="rhinoGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,160,170);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(110,110,120);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#rhinoGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="320" r="30" fill="url(#rhinoGrad)" />
  <path d="M 180 320 L 100 280 L 100 360 Z" fill="url(#rhinoGrad)" />
  <path d="M 100 280 L 120 250 L 120 280 Z" fill="#A9A9A9" />
</svg>

name: Striped Zebra
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="zebraGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(240,240,240);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#zebraGrad)" />
  <rect x="100" y="270" width="312" height="10" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="100" y="300" width="312" height="10" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="100" y="330" width="312" height="10" fill="#000000" />
  <rect x="100" y="360" width="312" height="10" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 120 300 L 120 450" stroke="url(#zebraGrad)" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Hippopotamus
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="hippoGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,150,160);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,100,110);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="90" fill="url(#hippoGrad)" />
  <rect x="100" y="320" width="80" height="30" fill="url(#hippoGrad)" />
  <circle cx="130" cy="335" r="5" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="335" r="5" fill="#333333" />
  <path d="M 180 320 L 220 300 L 180 300 Z" fill="url(#hippoGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Cheetah (Spotted)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="cheetahGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 300 C 150 200, 400 200, 450 300 C 400 350, 150 350, 100 300 Z" fill="url(#cheetahGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="250" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="280" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="250" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="300" cy="320" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="420" cy="300" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Baboon
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="baboonGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,110,90);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(110,60,40);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="80" fill="url(#baboonGrad)" />
  <rect x="200" y="200" width="112" height="30" fill="#8B4513" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 256 336 L 256 450" stroke="url(#baboonGrad)" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Gazelle
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="gazelleGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="80" fill="url(#gazelleGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="300" r="20" fill="url(#gazelleGrad)" />
  <path d="M 150 280 L 150 150" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 150 150 L 120 100 L 180 100 Z" fill="#000000" />
</svg>
